::Lord Elder::

Elder: I believe you are a good choice to command the military force against the minions. It is admirable of you to step down from command of the Iron Skulls as a show of good will. Who will lead them now?

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Jotunn: It will be uneasy, Lord Elder, but let us hope this goes
 straightforward. (To Razorwing) Of course, I am not stupid enough to
 deny my attempt to take power, but it obviously failed. I must commend
 your soldiers for that, Razorwing. As for this treaty here is what I
 demand: I want to be in charge of the military force that will attack
 and destroy the Minions. Plain and simple. Now, I know you want
 something back, and my disloyalty to the government means I must be
 punished. I will make that easy on you. In exchange of that command
 post, I would give up my place as Lord of the Iron Skulls. I will
 cease to have a say in their internal affairs and lose my voice in the
 government. My Lords, what do you say?
